content.rendered:
American Corners in Agbogba (Accra) and Kumasi provide access to current and reliable information about the United States through book collections, Internet access, and events and activities for everyone.

The American Corners’ computing stations, free Internet access, reading and workspace room, and book collection are available to the public, for everyone to enjoy, connect, and learn.   Access to the American Corner collections and programs is free and open to all.

American Corner Agbogba (in parntership with Mobile Web Ghana)
E-mail: americancorneragbogba@gmail.com
Phone number: +233 [0] 267777887
Hours of Operation: Monday-Friday 9:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Location: Mobile Web Ghana, near Antis Ltd, Dar es Salaam street, Agbogba, North Legon, Accra

American Corner Kumasi (in partnership with ACE Consult)
E-mail: americancornerkumasi@gmail.com
Phone number: +233 [0] 531100311
Hours of Operation: Monday – Friday 8:30 a.m. – 4:00 p.m.
Location: Top Martins Complex, Asokwa, Kumasi
